subject: Re: It's not alwasy the dead thart speak. [1 Attachment]
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I've gotten that date before, I think it was last year though. Maybe they don't know years, or maybe it's a time ripple for something that happened long ago? I think event create ripples in time, like throwing a rock in a pond. 

 F-S


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, nena.razmara@... wrote:
>
> They gave me a date of august 16th yesterday. Does anyone know if there is supposed to be a comet or orbiting body on or near that date.fema has also announced a national day of testing the broadcasting system for national emergencies on Nov 11.
> Sent via BlackBerry from T-Mobile
>

> "You Americans--Waste Metal--transmit-it---Stop India From Selling Her
> (lions) Worth-(or-ware)-Chips Of Metal" To me, it sounds like someone, of
> maybe a collective unconscious of India complaining about not getting their
> fair share of the market.
> 
>  The box picks up thoughts, we think, the spirits think, animals think, ET
> thinks--it all comes through the boxes. You do not have to go to the latest
> Hollywood haunted hot spot to get anything. But...whoooooosh right over
> everyone's head!
> 
>  F-S
